com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.testapp.adapter

Class FeatureAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<FeatureAdapter.ViewHolder>
      • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.testapp.adapter.FeatureAdapter

  • public class FeatureAdapter
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<FeatureAdapter.ViewHolder>
    Adapter used for FeatureOverviewActivity.

    Adapts a Feature to a visual representation to be shown in a RecyclerView.
